oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Agricultural Research in Europe - Current Status and Future Prospects
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niggli, Urs
Willer, Helga
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The paper takes a closer look at how organic farming research is organised in Europe and at what challenges researchers will face in the future.
The paper looks at the history of organic farming research, informs on current research structures as well as on coordination activities and lists EU-funded research projects (as of 2002).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niggli, Urs and Willer, Helga (2002) Organic Agricultural Research in Europe - Current Status and Future Prospects. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture. Online at <http://www.ewindows.eu.org/Agriculture/organic/Europe/Report/ <http://www.ewindows.eu.org/Agriculture/organic/Europe/Report/>>.
